```{r}
#| include: false
library(knitr)
library(tbeptools)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(gridExtra)
library(flextable)
library(dplyr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set("ft.shadow" = FALSE)

maxyr <- 2023
partialyr <- T

epcdata <- read_importwq('data/currentdata.xlsx', download_latest = F)

# get legend from an existing ggplot object
g_legend<-function(a.gplot){
  tmp <- ggplot_gtable(ggplot_build(a.gplot))
  leg <- which(sapply(tmp$grobs, function(x) x$name) == "guide-box")
  legend <- tmp$grobs[[leg]]
  return(legend)}
```

## RA FRAMEWORK

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
-   Each year, assess attainment of chlorophyll threshold in each segment
-   Follow NMC actions for segments that don't meet threshold
-   Annual reporting to FDEP

## MANAGEMENT RESULTS

```{r}
#| label: tbl-segtab
#| tbl-cap: "Table caption yeeeaaaaa"
totab <- anlz_yrattain(epcdata, yrsel = maxyr, partialyr = partialyr) %>%
  mutate(
    chla_val = round(chla_val, 1),
    chla_target = round(chla_target, 1),
    la_val = round(la_val, 2), 
    la_target = round(la_target, 2), 
    outcome = case_when(
      outcome == 'green' ~ '#2DC938',
      outcome == 'yellow' ~ '#E9C318', 
      outcome == 'red' ~ '#CC3231'
    )
  )

outcome <- totab$outcome
totab <- totab %>% 
  dplyr::select(-outcome)

cap.val <- paste0('Water quality outcomes for ', maxyr , '.')

tab <- flextable::flextable(totab) %>% 
  flextable::bg(j = 'bay_segment', bg = outcome) %>% 
  flextable::add_header_row(colwidths = c(1, 2, 2), values = c('Segment', 'Chl-a (ug/L)', 'light')) %>% 
  flextable::compose(
    i = 1, j = 4:5, part = "header",
    value = as_paragraph("Light Penetration (m", as_sup("-1"), ')') 
  ) %>% 
  flextable::set_header_labels(values = c('', maxyr, 'target', maxyr, 'target')) %>% 
  flextable::align(align = 'center', part = 'all', j = 2:5)# %>% 
  # flextable::set_caption(cap.val) %>% 
  # flextable::set_table_properties(layout = 'autofit')
tab %>% 
  fontsize(size = 14, part = 'all') %>% 
  padding(padding = 0, part = 'all') %>% 
  line_spacing(space = 0, part = 'body') %>% 
  line_spacing(space = 0, part = 'header')
```

* Sep - Dec based on average from five years prior

## CONCLUSIONS

* All segments provisionally meet management targets and regulatory thresholds in 2023 (through August)
* Second year of 2022 - 2026 RA period
* [2022 RA Update](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1e3KpnZFPJNm8TFlpSEfj3fHIa2nc6KfmKsn5LzaEp1g/edit?disco=AAAAaa0p5rc)
* Need to assess assimilative capacity of OTB
